LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Gladius.label: claíomh gearr
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Gladius.description: Claíomh gearr, éadrom. Is féidir é a luascadh go tapa.
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Gladius.tools.handle.label: lámh
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Gladius.tools.point.label: pointe
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Gladius.tools.edge.label: lann
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_LongSword.label: claíomh fada
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_LongSword.description: Seanarm ríoga, tá an claíomh fada trom agus cumhachtach.
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_LongSword.tools.handle.label: lámh
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_LongSword.tools.point.label: pointe
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_LongSword.tools.edge.label: lann
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Mace.label: más
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Mace.description: Tá an t-arm seo éifeachtach agus trom.
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Mace.tools.handle.label: lámh
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Mace.tools.head.label: barr
